website_summaries.verdict: Features and performance make this model a stellar product for a moderate price.
pros: Off the charts in terms of cooking performance and features
cons: Aluminum body can get very hot while cooking

customer_reviews.title: It will not simmer something like a pot roast
customer_reviews.text: Use mainly for bacon and eggs. It will not simmer something like a pot roast. The temperature control is an on/off switch so either it is full on or full off and the temperature swing means it stays on at full blast for about 15 seconds boiling graving and liquids and then off for about a minute with no simmering or bubbling. With the control on the right side the further away side is the hottest, the closest a little cooler and the middle more cooler. You have to move stuff like bacon or sausage around else some cooks faster. Looking for something better even if it cost a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Loved skillet, but it's all over now!
customer_reviews.text: Great skillet. Maintains temperature well. Very large and easy to mix stuff without spilling all over the counter. I mainly use it for casseroles so have not noticed any unique hot or cold spots. After about 6 months of very light use the nonstick coating is coming off. I have always just gently hand washed the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Old Coot

customer_reviews.title: BEST ELECTRIC FRYPAN FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This electric frypan can do SO MUCH. I grew up with an excellent one, and tried to find one just as good. This is it! It's great to be able to set the temperature precisely. Burgers, pancakes, grilled cheese, stew, and on and on. Nonstick surface of the inside AND outside make this EASY to clean. Glass cover let's one see how dinner is progressing. Cannot beat the price for how well this works. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love It! ❤️💕❤️💕❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve recently been ill and weakened quite a bit so I couldn’t stand at the stove to cook. I got this and plugged it into a heavy duty extension cord so I could cook right at the kitchen table. The nonstick is easy to clean and I’ve never met a De’Longhi product yet that didn’t exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: LisaCamdenNY

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I had to return a different one, different brand totally and more expensive, because the non stick finish started coming off after a few uses. I have used this twice now since receiving it. It is easy to use and easy to clean. The only thing I found slightly odd was that when it is heating up it does make a buzzing sound, not too loud but I have never seen one do that before, it doesn't seem to affect how it works though and it works like a charm. I always hand wash things like this and like I said before it is so easy to clean, I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Skillet at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skillet because I gave up on trying to replace my Cuisanart skillet because of problems with the heating element on both! I really like this skillet. It heats evenly and is large enough to fry a large amount of chicken or other meats. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's Old is New Again
customer_reviews.text: My mom used to cook in an electric skillet all the time and I never really understood why...now I do! It is such a timesaver for preparing meals in one pan, I'm able to regulate the temperature beautifully, and clean up is a breeze. I'll never be without one again.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't Expect to simmer with this pan
customer_reviews.text: Pan arrived in good condition, no damage. Upon testing using an infrared thermometer found the range from the set temp to actual temp be unacceptable, not even close. If you try to simmer something you'll find it will turn on then boil then shut down until below simmering temp then turn on and boil again. The range between on an off is way too far. Found it fine for burgers or frying fish, but the temp control is not as good as the el-cheapo I bought it to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Dungeondog

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: What a POS for an electric skillet! Don't let the positive reviews fool you like they did me.... I use an electric skillet daily for cooking my breakfast and this thing lasted 2 months at best before everything started sticking. Even tried a of butter to just cook a couple of eggs and now my breakfast meals are nothing more than egg scramble.... Works great if you like egg scramble bowls!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: This electric cooing pan seems to be better built than the usual off the shelf electric pan
customer_reviews.text: This electric cooing pan seems to be better built than the usual off the shelf electric pan. Everything about it seems to be built just a little more stoutly which is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Fonzie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t perform well
customer_reviews.text: This skillet is not stick proof. I took great care to use tools that wouldn’t scratch the surface, used oils and didn’t cook on high temperatures. Yet everything stuck to the surface where the element in the bottom was located. Very frustrating. I would NOT buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: James G Van Patten

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Delonghi electric skillet. My 1st one lasted for years but the coating was starting to come off. After looking at several other brands and reading all the customer reviews I decided to go with this brand again. I used it for the 1st time tonight to make my fried chicken and I was very happy with the results. It heated evenly and cook the chicken without any problems. I was not disappointed and I would definitely recommend the skillet. Again my 1st one lasted for years hopefully this one will as well.
customer_reviews.author: phxgal

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last April to replace one that was well over 20 Y.O. Have used it only a half dozen or so times and was quite satisfied until the other day when I was cleaning it I found small spots where the coating had lifted and came off. It is still usable as long as food does not come in contact with the surface but frying is no longer advisable. Now that it is already damaged I won't worry about using a rack. It still beats using my electric stove that eats electricity like Ms Pac Man on a rampage.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Flynn

customer_reviews.title: A must have, so spacious
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to buy one and finally I found what I was looking for. This is amazing for the prize, the size is way bigger than I thought so you know that’s a plus, is cute and modern. Cooks evenly and very well. I love it so much that o just bought another one for my daughter. By the way I use it in order not to mess up my expensive stove (yes I know I’m crazy)
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy And Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily and I am happy with the purchase. It is well made like many other Delonghi products. The cord is not as ridiculously short as many kitchen appliances today. Also the electrical plug goes directly into the unit versus into a magnetic plug which is awful if magnet is not strong enough. The handles are sturdy and do not get hot. Nonstick surface works as it should. I like the steam escape valve and glass lid. My only complaint is that it is hard to use for simmering. At 250 degrees it boils and at 200 the heat is too low. Hence 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it grips to my counter top. I was impressed how sturdy and heavy duty. Although a little heavy. I've already used it 4 times, I just got it monday!!! Today is saturday. I'm really happy with this purchase. I've been looking for one for quite sometime and took a chance on this product. It was well worth the price!! Which was at all too expensive.. The only issue I have is that there is a kinda dead spot on the far right. If you flip it over, and compare it left to right, you can see the heating element falls short. Maybe because the temperature control is on that side. Make sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: mardee

customer_reviews.title: There are spots that get hotter than others so my pancakes weren't always "absolutely perfect in color"
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a camping trip so I could make breakfast. I ended up using it for TONS of things. I even made Pasta in it. There are spots that get hotter than others so my pancakes weren't always "absolutely perfect in color"....but I could care less. It is a great size. It cleans up super easy. I love this product. I now use it at home so I can make three pancakes at once rather than one at a time on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: FSB67

customer_reviews.title: The Teflon coating bubbled and peeled after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My last electric skillet was over five years old before it ever started peeling the Teflon coating off. I’ve had this item since April 22 and it is now June 23 in the coding is already peeling off everywhere and it’s bubbled using it the same way I used my other one. Would not recommend this product whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Annoying hum
customer_reviews.text: Loud hum just like the other reviews have said. Other than that it is heavy duty and evenly tempered. We use it almost everyday so we will see how well it holds up. Annoying hum though
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: New or used?
customer_reviews.text: Terrible...Ive must confess that in boxing and surprise to find this product incomplete is embarrassing. This item is probably a great skillet , a wonderful addition to kitchen. But no , absolutely no way to use it without it's power cord. Now it's on us to return print label but the one 1 star rating is a star better than I felt when wife opened in wrapped it, her birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.Fluharty

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for grilled cheese
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I bought it for my mom for Christmas and she just started using it. The only thing is so far that has been a problem is she is not as strong as she used to be and its heavier than the old one she had before. It is also much better than the other one. It is so much better to cook with. Even temps so everything cooks the same, it's a game changer for grilled cheese. I don't think you would be unhappy with this if you bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Dani M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Skillet I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This skillet has the best heat distribution of any I’ve previously owned. I thought about taking off a star because there is still a very slight temperature variation on the end with the heating control, but it’s not much and I can live with it. I was skeptical of how easy it would be to clean, but the texture in the bottom cleans as though it isn’t there. It has no detrimental effect at all. Well worth the money and I’d buy it again. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Skillet seems to inconsistently cycle off then back on during operation. Example is when frying bacon, you will hear the bacon sizzle, then the sizzle slowly goes away as the unit seems to cool down a bit, then the sizzle comes back as the skillet heats back up. This has been frustrating for my spouse. Otherwise, unit seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice skillet but to heavy to handle even without the casserole, I returned and purchased another at BBB.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After having to replace my last skillet, I tried to do some homework. I selected this product based on the reviews and have not been disappointed yet. The skillet heats and cooks very evenly. Pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: P. Pope

customer_reviews.title: It's big.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine skillet. Works well with good temperature control. Large size means it's great for cooking for a crowd, but also that it takes a lot of storage space when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: aesch

customer_reviews.title: It's an electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent skillet that gets the job done. I have not found the perfect electric skillet yet. The temperature control could use better markings so you would know about what temperature you are actually setting it for. This one has bigger handles than our last one so it was a tight fit in our cabinet. So far it has cooked well.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Original packaging is punchured, has closure tabs torn off, and is very dusty.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift. I am unsure if the product is damaged. It looks ok from the outside. The original packaging is tore, punctured, and dirty. It was selected to ship this way as the Amazon box is perfect. I will clean and tape it up but will be returning it if the product is damaged in any way or it does not work. How sad to give a gift that looks like it is from a "seconds" store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar product to this for 10 years and was really missing it after it broke! I was happy to find one this size because all my local stores only had electric skillets that were 12x12. I love this thing and the only issue I have had is that I it gets a little hotter on the areas where the heating element is located. As long as you keep this in mind it work wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Best Skillet Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this skillet. With 4 teenagers in the house and cooking dinner every night, it is perfect! I have used electric skillets for over 30 years and purchased many brands. This one in the best one I have ever owned. The temperature is pretty evenly dispersed and it cleans up easily . I purchased two for Christmas, one for my son and one for my daughter. I will be purchasing another for myself soon since, after years of use, the nonstick coating is gone however, the thing still works! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The cord is not very long, but that is a safety feature and I had no problem with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully crafted skillet. It's a bit larger than I realized, but after using it once I would never part with it. It heats evenly and the temperature is convenient and easy to control. I am very pleased with the performance and appearance of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had an electric skillet for 20 yrs by oster that died. I have now been through 5 others in a year that I just donated because uneven heating. So far this one is far exceeding the others. It’s big and deep and bacon and fried potatoes have cooked beautifully. I was skeptical never hearing of the brand but I purchased based on heat distribution reviews alone which is the hardest part to find on an electric skillet. I’ve used it 6 times so far. I will update my review if I begin to see issues. Oh and dishwasher safe??!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this skillet!
customer_reviews.text: I asked for this skillet for Christmas and I am very happy with it. I based my decision on the reviews, the size is large so I can make larger amounts of food when I have company. It heats evenly and maintains the temperature. It is dishwasher safe and very easy to clean. I really like the vent being adjustable I can open it wide or not at all or in between depending on what I am cooking. The skillet is well made, good price, good quality. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Sifontes

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this electric skillet. It is large enough to make a skillet dinner for me and a small group of friends. The temp control seems to work very well, too. seems to heat a lot more even than my old one. Took a chance as I never heard of De'longhi and glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in De’Longhi
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our $150 breville electric skillet. I didn’t want to spend that kind of money again. That was stupid. I should’ve just spent the money. Everything sticks to this. Eggs, French toast, hash browns...everything we use an electric skillet for.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Have owned a different brand of skillet and after awhile would always have to replace. So this time, bought this brand and I love it. Have not had any problems with anything sticking and cleanup is a breeze. No flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Aceani

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I always check the reviews and in this case, I think they were right for the most part. This skillet has been a good purchase and works well. I just wish it was a little easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with product
customer_reviews.text: I had to finish cooking my meal in a skillet on the stove top and returned product. Did not get up to the temperature its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Moriarity

customer_reviews.title: Best electric skillet ever.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for wings, fried chicken, pancakes, french toast, meatballs and sauce. Holds a lot of food. Nice looking. Easy to cook with. Plan on a place to store it. It's pretty big. I wrap the cord in a dish towel before storing it in the pan to protect the finish. Use high heat rubber utensils. Expect it to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S.

customer_reviews.title: A must have appliance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. We own the same pan and love it. Great temperature and heat is distributed evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Teflon ever
customer_reviews.text: The function of the skillet is excellent however the Teflon is the worst I’ve ever seen I have cast-iron pans that work better than this Teflon is not supposed to stick
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: No, it did not.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the size of the skillet and the hot spots. It wasn't even heat for cooking. It was a sturdy heavy constructed skillet which I did like.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Copp

customer_reviews.title: used a few times, working great
customer_reviews.text: defiinitely has hot spots I don't they have the ability to coil the heating element across the bottom like a snake so it cooks more evenly. Guess this is as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Best skillet ever, bought 3
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the size and high sides. Took it to a family week trip. 19 of us in a cabin and the 5 cooks that cooked in it loved it. So I bought one for my daughter and one for my daughter in love and they are thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: This pan is very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is very good quality ... food does not stick to the bottom of the pan.. even heat distribution....easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up, and temp control for a variety of cooking methods
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skillet after using one in a vacation rental. Great space, temp control and super easy clean up. To clear up some other reviews, you CAN completely control the temp. I’ve deep fried potptes in this, made pancakes, and quesadillas. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Weejack

customer_reviews.title: Better than described
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to receive this after just one day of ordering. The timing was superb. I used to make chicken franchese the same day. If was easy to use, even temperature and dinner was a hit. It's also roomy. I would have had to cook it in 3 separate batches in my frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine DeSalvio

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this skillet the glass lid has enough heft to keep the skillet contents cooking with the temp you select. Easy to clean and store not super high lid so fits my shelf well.
customer_reviews.author: Herv

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Way better than the one it replaced. Heats well and evenly metal is thick and seems well built. There where some reviews of the no stick flaking off. I will definitely update if this happens. But initial quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Pegleg D

customer_reviews.title: Just buy some other cheap unit
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit or 6 months. Surface became uncleanable and everything Sticks to surface. Just go buy some cheap unit and plan on replacing every 6-8 months
customer_reviews.author: daddie

customer_reviews.title: Bad temperature control! Food sticks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pan worked great until about two weeks in. Thermostat does not stay at a constant temperature!! Gets hot then cools down . Constantly having to adjust it, so the food sticks to the pan!! Very disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Non stick coating comes off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit 1 year ago and the non-stick coating has mostly disappeared. Nothing really sticks to it, it's just that the black coating has pretty much disintegrated. It does work great and heats fairly evenly, but I wish the black coating would have lasted more than one year. I never used a green scrubby to clean it, just liquid Dawn soap and a very soft bristle brush.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: It is fine in every way except the power supply. It is so tight I need help inserting and removing it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita  B Weintraub

customer_reviews.title: Not all it claims to be.
customer_reviews.text: This skillet does everything that the one I replaced with this one did. It wasn't uniformly frying. Hotter in some area's than others. It fries hot for awhile but then quits when thermostat light goes out. No continuous frying. And partly might fault...The glass lid shattered when I dropped it on the counter accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Karl  A

customer_reviews.title: careful with the nonstick.
customer_reviews.text: cared for as instructed and the nonstick was chipping off in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: james greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use & easy to clean. Item is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Makes everything better!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love bacon in this skillet! Keeps perfect temperatures and no “hot” spots....very even temperatures across the skillet. “Lots of room for activities”!
customer_reviews.author: Jon & Destiny Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Cook healthy/never use abrasives to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am experienced with electric skillet. It's good and fits my lifestyle. I am not allowed a range. I use counter top appliances. I cook healthy meals for one. Just as in a full kitchen. When cleaning I use hot water and liquid detergent. Never do I use anything other than a soft sponge. Still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love the high walls. Just wish it had a corner spout to pour off grease.
customer_reviews.author: Nice marmot!

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Made lasagna, Sheppard pie, breakfast taters and all sorts of other crap in it at work. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Extra cord
customer_reviews.text: Skillet is fine but I received two plug in electric cords with the thermostat control. What do you want me to do with the extra one? It was in the product box
customer_reviews.author: Gesny

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: We use our electric skillet 4 - 5 times a week. As with all of them, if you have a split sink, they are not the easiest to clean. This one is no different. I am very happy with the nonstick property of this skillet and the temp control works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I was used to a hinged but removable  top, this one is totally separate
customer_reviews.text: the pan shows where the heating element is situated. ??
customer_reviews.author: MargaretC

customer_reviews.title: Why cancer warning ?
customer_reviews.text: The labeling on the front has a cancer warning and I didn’t understand why Sharon Montgomery
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Loving this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I use it several times weekly. Very easy cleanup too.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The section furthest from the plug does not get as hot as the rest of the pan but knowing this, it was easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J

customer_reviews.title: Really nice appliance. Deep skillet which is perfect for frying ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice appliance. Deep skillet which is perfect for frying a large batch of chicken or anything else. Very easy to clean up as well and I feel that the appliance has nice, even heating throughout. The food I have cooked in it has come out perfect! I would highly recommend this electric skillet for those who are looking to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new electric frying pan, but only time will tell if the "non-stick" surface will last. I've had several less expensive fry pans that only lasted a year before the "non- stick" coating broke down. I'm hoping that this more expensive fry pan will last longer. So far I'm happy with my new purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A.

customer_reviews.title: A second range really
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, the feedback has been great. lots of room in there no need to squish the pork chops or bacon and it can be placed somewhere convenient in the kitchen rather than hanging out over the range.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Browne Bertuch

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Used to cook our trout in perfect for the big ones
customer_reviews.author: P H

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged for shipment. Cooks extremely well at all temp settings.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Chase

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice electric skillet!
customer_reviews.text: I had my old electric skillet for over 30 years. I'm so glad I waited to replace it with this one. Very nice looking skillet and a perfect size for a one pan family meal.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Croston

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I need. Either the demensions were not included or I missed them
customer_reviews.author: Wondering

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Addition!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of surface to handle a whole batch of fried chicken, easy clean-up (altho I would NEVER put it in the dishwasher). This product is a great value for the price and is made by a company that offers many dependable innovative products.
customer_reviews.author: sandra jane mcgahan

customer_reviews.title: Nice for family cooking
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's large and deep enough to cook dishes for our family of 6. The vent in the lid doesn't seem to work well or properly but it's not a problem for me. The heat seems even enough. I've used it several times and like it. Sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ronsmoon

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!! Used for a couple months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! Used for a couple months now and heats evenly because the element is attached right to the pan. Gets up to temp fast and stays there without kicking off like others might. Best money I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ploor

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love the pan but, as in most electric skillets, heating is a little uneven in spots
customer_reviews.author: Vernetta Williams

customer_reviews.title: Defective electric skillet.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for first 3 times, then temperature of pan wouldn't come up to selected setting. Still works ,(intermittently )won't reach 350 degrees. Good price if worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet for work week meals!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skillet. Easy to use and very easy to clean. It is a work horse for me during the work week for preparing supper! Heats evenly with no hot spots. The rubber pads on the stand are also convenient since it keeps the unit firmly in place while stirring.
customer_reviews.author: crik

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than I wanted, but works out fine, actually fits better on counters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I love how easily it cleans up
customer_reviews.text: The sides are deep for roasting as well. It does lack in even heating, but I love how easily it cleans up.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Schumaker

customer_reviews.title: So handy and easier to clean than cooking on the gas stove.
customer_reviews.text: I have one from years ago and loved mine. My daughter borrowed it and wanted one for herself. Cleans up so easy and nothing burns in it, yet you can brown potatoes or meats. Great skillet. Every party I have had for 10 years I have used mine to keep some type of food warm. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Greatest electric skillet!!!
customer_reviews.text: My old skillet was 30 years old and finally broke down. This new skillet is absolutely wonderful...both in size (rectangular and big) and the way it heats...very evenly with no hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fingerhut

customer_reviews.title: I love this skillet and how big it is
customer_reviews.text: I love this skillet and how big it is! We are a family of 6 and this meets our cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Darcede

customer_reviews.title: you choose how much to vent the top.....
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. Deep pan, good non-stick coating, no hot spots, and I really like the heavy glass cover with the adjustable venting feature. Sometime a cook wants to keep all the moisture in and others times you want to let it out, depending on the dish. Nice to have the flexibility. Well made and seems like it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: T Rex

customer_reviews.title: Well made skillet
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my new skillet. Non-stick surface works very well. Definitely feels like it is well made. It is quite large which I like but I could probably have gotten away with a 12" square skillet. Overall, I would recommend this skillet to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DiMare

customer_reviews.title: Heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: We wanted even distribution of heat, and this is certainly not that. Try cooking bacon and pancakes on it... Does not work too well on that! It was just too much trouble to send it back, but I would advise new byers to look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and uniformity in heating. I prepared a new dish for the grandchildren for drop-in dinner. The low setting kept the meal warm without the pasta component becoming dry or overcooked.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: This skillet did an awesome job. It was the first time I've used ...
customer_reviews.text: This skillet did an awesome job.It was the first time I've used and electric skillet and loved it. I chose it over some other brands because it has the steam vent and this was very useful. The thermostat was very responsive and it did an awesome job frying the chicken evenly! clean up was amazing! Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.

customer_reviews.title: Search for Electric Pan Over
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a electric frying pan that heats evenly and one that the controls really maintain the temperature that I set. This is the one. The size was bigger than I wanted, but I see where it will come on handy for holiday meals to keep things warm. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: LEF

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to have in my RV and is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I found this skillet to heat very evenly when compared to my Rival electric skillet. I bought this to have in my RV and is better than I expected. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet
customer_reviews.text: Nice big, heavy duty skillet. works wonderful. Don't waste your money or time on cheaper skillets they just do not work as well as this one! Eve
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Haase

customer_reviews.title: Only So so — would
customer_reviews.text: This is just okay. It is very large — which is not a bad thing — but it heats very unevenly. Would not purchase again and would not recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe how much I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how much I love this unit. I have paid a lot more for electric skillets, but this one is very useful, accurate and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Frances A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family
customer_reviews.text: You could fry 50 meatballs in this thing- love love love it - very easy to clean and built well
customer_reviews.author: Barb Valentino

customer_reviews.title: good for volume
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read the specs properly. This is a LARGE skillet and heavy. But it works well. It is just a pain in the neck to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Bass

customer_reviews.title: the leg broke off! Unexpected!! Full of ...
customer_reviews.text: the leg broke off! Unexpected!! Full of food! Used a tuna can to hold it in place. Tossed it in the trash. JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Susan W Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: I like the skillet very much - but it is big and heavy. I wish there was a square one available, instead of the rectangle.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating wears out before 2 years
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay while it worked. A little less than 2 years from purchase date, the non-stick coating is beginning to flake off in the corners. It was only used 2-3 times a week. I expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great large capacity fryer
customer_reviews.text: good product, but had a broken knob on the lid when received. Have been unable to get the knob replaced. Usable but not happy that it was broken in package
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

product_meta.title: De'Longhi Electric Skillet with Tempered Glass Lid, 16" X 12", Black
product_meta.description: Easily make anything for breakfast, lunch and dinner with the De'Longhi Electric Skillet. You will always get consistent and thoroughly cooked foods with the fully embedded skillet base, it distributes heat evenly to avoid any overly hot or cold spots. Impress your family and guests by using the tempered glass lid, it will keep your food tasting perfect and juicy, and it conveniently keeps already cooked food warm. To cook food to your exact preference, use the detachable adjustable thermostat for ideal results. If you've been cooking for hours, you won't be cleaning for hours, simply wipe off the non-stick skillet base and lid and place them in the dishwasher. It's that easy! With an extra-large surface, you can make a meal for your family or a party in no time at all. It's safety first with this electric skillet, the cool touch handles allow for easy movement once cooking is complete. Plates material: Aluminium.
feature_bullets: The embedded heating element guarantees the most efficient and even cooking in the shortest time
Non-stick surface, External dimensions (l x w x h inches):19.29 x 11.81 x 8.47
Adjustable steam vent holes for an easy steam evaporation, Rated voltage/Frequency (V~Hz):110-120 V
Easy-to-clean with dishwasher-safe lid and non-stick skillet base; Simply place in the dishwasher for fast and convenient cleaning
Die Cast Aluminum body, Input power (W):1500

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
